definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This paper introduces the application of second generation expert system in blanking technology ES.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了第二代專家系統在衝壓工藝設計中的應用。

sentences.english: The feature expert system which services tolerance analysis and tolerance synthesis is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一個服務於公差分析與綜合的特徵專家系統。

sentences.english: Expert systems are another name for Classical AI.
sentences.chinese: 專家系統是古典人工智能的別稱。

sentences.english: The optimizer is equivalent in function to an expert system.
sentences.chinese: 優化器在功能上等價於一個專家系統。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the fault diagnostic expert system that includes system structure, function and self-study capacity for gas generator.
sentences.chinese: 建立了一個適用於燃氣輪機的故障診斷專家系統。

sentences.english: In expert system fields, knowledge rules are made up of premises and conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 專家系統領域中，知識規則是由前提和結論組成的。

sentences.english: We hope it will do good to develop and maintain ES.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法有利於更好地開發和維護專家系統。

sentences.english: A real-time obstacle-avoiding expert system based on a multibeam forward looking sonar is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種基於多波束前視聲納的實時避障專家系統。

sentences.english: In this thesis, an auto-control draft for jigging air-valve based on expert system is researched.
sentences.chinese: 本論文研究了基於專家系統的跳汰機風閥的自動控制。

sentences.english: The expert system for vibrating ore-drawing shaft is designed using computer.
sentences.chinese: 利用計算機手段設計實現了振動出礦溜井專家系統。

sentences.english: Therefore, an ideal frame is established for cartographic expert system of qualitative information.
sentences.chinese: 從而爲定性信息的製圖專家系統建立了一個思維框架。

sentences.english: The real-time expert system consists of two strategies of meta control layer and goal control layer.
sentences.chinese: 實時專家系統由元級控制和目標級控制組成。

sentences.english: Is missing the child association to seek the expert system the object-oriented realization.
sentences.chinese: 失蹤兒童協尋專家系統的面向對象實現。

sentences.english: This paper introduces YZMES, an expert system for die -cast mould design.
sentences.chinese: 壓鑄模設計專家系統YZMES系模塊化結構。

sentences.english: This paper carries out rese. arch in some kinds of learning functions of the design-type expert system.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重研究了設計型專家系統的學習功能。

sentences.english: In this paper, the process to develop and apply the expert system for cylindrical building blasting demolition.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了筒形建築物爆破拆除專家系統的開發與應用。
